_sText:
**Hunger Games**
==================
**>Update in Progress<**
------------------
	Hunger games is a new mod that we are developing and will hopefully be successful in the future, you dont have any weapons at the start, its a free for all game, where you have to find boxes to get weapons to kill your enemies.


**News in the Beta version**
==================

New 3D skybox is addded we removed the walls and added water instead.

Weapons are randomly spawned in the boxes.

New water texture.

More Boxes.

Fixed sharp edges on some mountains.

24 players.

The round restarts automaticly when theres only 1 left (but only if players dont join in the middle of the game)





**Planned Future**
====================

Arena is planned.

Optimizing.

Servers:
========

	87.98.152.38:27016
